Key Match Events: India won the match by 6 wickets
Rinku Singh hit a quick-fire 16 in the match
Pre-Game Insights: MS Dhoni gave Rinku Singh advice on staying calm and composed during high-pressure chases
Post-Match Reflections: Rinku Singh reflected on how MS Dhoni's advice helped him stay calm during the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rinku Singh has become one of the finest finishers in T20I cricket
He has hit 278 runs in 13 T20Is, averaging 69.50 with a strike rate of 180
Others: Rinku Singh's most memorable T20I performance came during the second match against South Africa, where he scored an unbeaten 68 off just 39 balls
